contest-event.event-date:
July 27, 1907 D Stirling Contest
Stirling Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
stirling-contest
None
Springkerse Grounds, Stirling 1st prize £10 and cup, 2nd prize £7, 3rd prize £4, 4th prize £3, 5th prize £2. March contest 1st (£1) and 2nd (10s.) divided between Laurieston Westquarter and Burnbank Public. 7 bands competed.
March 28, 2012, 3:59 p.m. Sept. 20, 2018, 10:45 a.m.
1 Laurieston Friend Farrand Weber [arr. Round]
2 Falkirk Trades Friend Farrand Rossini [arr. Round]
3 Kilsyth Town Edward Sutton Meyerbeer [arr. Round]
4 Glasgow Iron and Steel Works Jack Remington Recollections of Balfe
5 Wright Memorial Charlie Wright Heroic
Unknown Result Camelon Brass Band John Brown
Unknown Result Burnbank T. Blench Maritana [unknown arranger]
